title: Analysis Methodology
subtitle: Forensic graphological analysis system for signature verification

graphological.title: Graphological Parameters
graphological.description: 15 weighted parameters that determine compatibility between signatures

naturalness.title: Naturalness Analysis
naturalness.description: 4 parameters to detect dissimulations and imitations

metadata.title: Metadata and Calibration
metadata.description: Technical and informational parameters for system support

overview.systemDescription: GrapholexInsight utilizes an advanced system combining Python analysis, TypeScript backend orchestration, and React visualization to provide ENFSI-compliant graphological expertise.

parameters.graphologicalDescription: The 5 parameters with highest weight in compatibility calculation. Together they contribute to 60% of total graphological parameters weight.
parameters.naturalnessDescription: Specialized parameters to detect dissimulations, imitations and falsifications through graphic automatism analysis.
parameters.pressureMean: Average stroke pressure - most important indicator for authenticity
parameters.avgCurvature: Average stroke curvature - unconscious and distinctive characteristic
parameters.velocity: Estimated execution velocity - difficult to control in imitation
parameters.pressureStd: Pressure variability - indicator of emotional state

naturalness.fluidity: Graphic movement fluidity - crucial for detecting imitations

inclination.title: Inclination Algorithm (Forensic Specific)
inclination.description: Uses Principal Component Analysis to determine main stroke direction and calculates inclination relative to vertical.

pressure.title: Pressure Analysis
pressure.description: Calculates mean and standard deviation of pixel intensity to determine stroke pressure.

naturalness.title: Combined Naturalness Index
naturalness.description: Weighted formula combining fluidity, pressure consistency and motor coordination to detect dissimulations.

interpretation.title: Result Interpretation
interpretation.description: Authenticity thresholds follow international forensic standards and combine graphic similarity with execution naturalness.

matrix.title: 2D Classification Matrix
matrix.description: Final verdict combines similarity score with naturalness index for complete forensic classification.

documentation.title: Complete Documentation
documentation.description: For an in-depth understanding of all parameters, algorithms and graphological meanings, consult the complete technical documentation.
